title: Bayonetta announced for Smash 4

embed.description: Uploaded by Super Smash Bros. on 2015-12-15.

body:
The announce trailer for Bayonetta for Smash 4. I knew she was gonna make it. Now we just need;

Django (Boktai)
Shantae (Shantae)
Shanoa (Castlevania)
Hector/Cordellia/Panne etc. (Fire Emblem)

Also, thats ANOTHER Amiibo I need. Added to the list of:

Lucina
Palutena
Marth
Zero Suit Samus
Link
